title: QA: review launch content accuracy
description: Review all docs/ content for accuracy: verify CLI examples actually work, check version numbers, ensure no stale references. Cross-reference README claims with actual features.

comments.text:
QA review of all launch content. Found 7 accuracy issues:

BUG-1 (HIGH): README shows 'mx-lite config get provider' but CLI has no 'config get' subcommand. Only show/set/reset/path exist.

BUG-2 (MEDIUM): README says default playlist length is 25 but actual default is 30.

BUG-3 (MEDIUM): README says config stored in ~/.config/mixaroo-lite/ but actual path is ~/.config/mixaroo-lite-nodejs/.

BUG-4 (MEDIUM): PUBLISHING.md claims ~30 files, ~17 kB, excluding tests. Actual: 102 files, 40 kB, tests included (related to TASK-033 tarball leak).

BUG-5 (LOW): Blog post says '~500 lines of TypeScript' â€” actual source is ~1668 lines.

BUG-6 (LOW): Blog post lists 'Save/load' and 'Expand' as future roadmap, but save/list/play are already implemented. Roadmap section is stale.

BUG-7 (INFO): CHANGELOG date says 2026-02-20. Confirm this is the intended release date.

PASS: All CLI commands in README work correctly (setup, config show/set/reset/path, list, play, history, completions bash/zsh/fish).
PASS: Model names match actual code (gpt-4o-mini, gemini-1.5-flash, claude-3-haiku).
PASS: --version, --help, --length, --provider, --save, --verbose flags all present.
PASS: Demo script, recording guide, twitter thread, reddit posts, HN post are internally consistent.
